page.title: 17Nether Stowey: At Home
page.content: For most people in this area home life is pleasant and comfortable. Homes are in a state of good repair and many people do their own decorating. The most widely used fuels for domestic heating are coal and electricity. Gas is available and a few homes use this. Electricity is the most popular means of cooking,followed by gas. Bottled gas is used in some outlying areas.Numerous electrical appliances are used in the home, workshop,garage and garden. Many homes have a telephone. People appear to be safety conscious in their homes, having fire guards and first aid boxes. A good proportion possess fire extinguishers but very few have fire blankets for the kitchen. Most families can enjoy a garden and many grow their own vegetables, some having an allotment. Dogs and cats are most common pets.
